issues.title: [Bug] TemporalWorker::ExecuteAsync(Func<Task>) swallows exceptions, throws TaskCanceledException instead
issues.author: adeal
issues.summary: The non-generic ExecuteAsync(Func<Task>) overload loses exceptions thrown by user tasks and throws TaskCanceledException instead. This regression affects workflows returning Task (void) but not Task<T>, caused by using OnlyOnRanToCompletion continuation option that discards exceptions.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support linux-musl-arm64
issues.author: tomflenner-dg
issues.summary: The .NET SDK lacks support for the linux-musl-arm64 runtime identifier, preventing deployment on Alpine-based ARM64 containers. With .NET 10 discontinuing Debian images, Alpine becomes a primary choice, making this support essential for modern containerized deployments.

issues.title: [Bug] Investigate `ExecuteNexusOperationAsync_SyncTimeout_FailsAsExpected` flake
issues.author: jmaeagle99
issues.summary: A test for Nexus operation timeout handling is flaking due to a CancellationTokenSource being disposed prematurely. The test fails with ObjectDisposedException when trying to access the WaitHandle of an already-disposed cancellation token source.

issues.title: [Bug] Some unlikely workflow task failures like failure conversion issues may be lost
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Task failures during child workflow startup, particularly those occurring in failure conversion logic within QueueNewTaskAsync, may not be properly caught and logged, resulting in lost error information. The issue affects StartChildWorkflowAsync and potentially other callsites.

issues.title: Refactor Bridge.Client to be IDisposable instead of a SafeHandle
issues.author: jmaeagle99
issues.summary: Refactor Bridge.Client from SafeHandle to IDisposable pattern to match Bridge.Worker implementation and eliminate duplicate SafeHandle wrappers for unmanaged Interop.TemporalCoreClient pointers.

issues.title: Separate unmanaged pointer lifecycle management into SafeHandles
issues.author: jmaeagle99
issues.summary: Extend SafeHandle implementations to manage unmanaged pointer lifecycles across all .NET bridge classes, following the pattern established in #583 for Client and Worker. This requires centralizing pointer lifetime management through SafeHandle types and providing a Scope.Pointer method for controlled pointer access.

issues.title: Nexus operation ignores ScheduleToCloseTimeout and retries every 10 seconds
issues.author: neeraj-mathur
issues.summary: Nexus operation was retrying every 10 seconds instead of respecting the configured 2-hour ScheduleToCloseTimeout. The issue occurred because the Nexus operation implementation was synchronous and didn't complete quickly enough, causing the start to retry after 10 seconds.

issues.title: [Bug] Loading TLS certificates from path doesn't work
issues.author: maciejdudko
issues.summary: The .NET SDK's TLS certificate loading from file paths doesn't work for Temporal Cloud mTLS authentication. When using the TEMPORAL_TLS_CLIENT_CERT_PATH environment variable, connection fails with a certificate error, but the same certificate works when provided via TEMPORAL_TLS_CLIENT_CERT_DATA.

issues.title: [Bug] SIGSEGV crash in temporal_core_worker_poll_workflow_activation on Linux
issues.author: cfauchere
issues.summary: SIGSEGV crash occurs intermittently in temporal_core_worker_poll_workflow_activation on Linux during workflow polling, preceded by activity heartbeat failures. The crash is environment-specific, occurring only in Linux CI but not on local Windows development.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add tests to confirm proper Nexus support for time-skipping environment
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add tests to verify Nexus support in the time-skipping test server environment for .NET SDK. This addresses a gap in test coverage introduced when Nexus was initially added, with a known dependency on resolving a blocker issue in the Java SDK.

issues.title: [Bug] Investigate test host crash flake
issues.author: jmaeagle99
issues.summary: Test host process crashes intermittently on CI with SIGSEGV occurring in the P/Invoke layer during workflow activation completion. Root cause identified as premature destruction of ByteArrayRef objects during process shutdown, freeing native-visible resources that are still in use by Rust code.

issues.title: [Feature Request] .NET Analyzer for Checking Workflows
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request for a Roslyn analyzer tool for .NET to detect workflow constraint violations at compile-time, similar to existing analyzers in Go and Java SDKs. The analyzer should transitively check for invalid actions within workflows, display call graph stacks for violations, and integrate with the Temporalio NuGet package.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Allow custom meter implementation to disable tracing event listener
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Allow custom meter implementations to disable the tracing event listener when emitting metrics from workflows. Users with custom meters that use non-deterministic threading should be able to wrap meter calls with Workflow.Unsafe.WithTracingEventListenerDisabled to prevent tracing violations.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support non-workflow activities
issues.author: maciejdudko
issues.summary: Feature request to enable executing activities outside of workflow context. This requires both client and worker support for new server APIs that manage activity lifecycle independently of workflows.

issues.title: Refactor test workflows into separate files
issues.author: jmaeagle99
issues.summary: Proposal to refactor test workflows into separate files following a `*.workflow.cs` naming pattern to enable removal of inline code analysis suppressions and use `.editorconfig` recommendations for the test suite.

issues.title: Use global.json file to centralize SDK version
issues.author: jmaeagle99
issues.summary: Request to add a global.json file to centralize .NET SDK version specification across the repository. Currently, the SDK version is scattered across multiple build pipelines and GitHub workflows with no single source of truth.

issues.title: [Bug] Envconfig - Use correct `TemporalClientConnectOptions` constructor
issues.author: THardy98
issues.summary: The Envconfig implementation incorrectly uses a TemporalClientConnectOptions constructor that requires a non-null target host string, forcing users to supply an empty string which results in a client unable to connect to a server.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Allow overriding of the Worker Deployment Version when invoking a Child Workflow
issues.author: chris-olszewski
issues.summary: Users need the ability to override the target deployment version when invoking a child workflow from within a worker, similar to how version override works when creating workflows from a client.

issues.title: [Feature Request] OperatorService (RPC) and WorkflowService (RPC) members are marked virtual or inherit from interface
issues.author: kimpenhaus
issues.summary: User requests that OperatorService and WorkflowService RPC methods be marked virtual or extracted to interfaces to enable mocking with NSubstitute for unit testing Kubernetes operators. The discussion explores alternatives like using ephemeral dev servers and subclassing with public delegator methods.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Enable Worker Heartbeating
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: Worker heartbeating needs to be enabled in the .NET SDK by allowing users to specify the worker heartbeat interval when initializing Core Runtime. This feature is already implemented in Core but not exposed to .NET users.

issues.title: [Bug] Investigate `CanRunWith_CustomSlotSupplier` flake
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The test `CanRunWith_CustomSlotSupplier` flakes intermittently with an assertion failure (expected 27 but got 28) and a worker finalization error indicating an unexpected reference count during shutdown.

issues.title: [Bug] Investigate `ExecuteWorkflowAsync_PollingBehavior_Autoscaling` flake
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The `ExecuteWorkflowAsync_PollingBehavior_Autoscaling` test flakes intermittently with an empty collection error, indicating a race condition or timing issue in the worker's polling autoscaling behavior.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Move `ClientEnvConfig` from `Temporalio.Client.EnvConfig` to `Temporalio.Common.EnvConfig`
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Move ClientEnvConfig from the client-specific namespace (Temporalio.Client.EnvConfig) to the common namespace (Temporalio.Common.EnvConfig) to align with other SDKs and improve API organization. This is a backwards-incompatible change that is acceptable since the SDK is not yet GA.

issues.title: [.net] Plugin + SimplePlugin
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Implement a Plugin system for .NET SDK to allow users to self-serve creating integrations with Temporal Workflows, following the pattern already established in the Python SDK.

issues.title: [Bug] Memory Leak in Temporalio.Bridge.CancellationToken
issues.author: robcao
issues.summary: Memory leak in CancellationToken callbacks where CancellationTokenRegistration objects are not being disposed, causing accumulation of CallbackNode objects in memory. The ReleaseHandle method is never invoked because CancellationToken instances are not properly identified in the Scope disposal logic.

issues.title: [Bug] Remove erroneous `Temporalio.Workflows.NexusOperationOptions.OperationName`
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Remove the erroneous `OperationName` property from `Temporalio.Workflows.NexusOperationOptions` as it is not used and should not be part of the API.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support Nexus in `Temporalio.Extensions.Hosting`
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add Nexus service support within the Temporalio.Extensions.Hosting dependency injection framework for .NET SDK.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Nexus custom slot suppliers
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to ensure Nexus slot info and custom slot supplier are fully implemented and tested in the .NET SDK.

issues.title: [Bug] KeywordList cannot be resolved as part of WorkflowExecutionDescription
issues.author: petrkoutnycz
issues.summary: KeywordList search attributes cannot be resolved from WorkflowExecutionDescription.TypedSearchAttributes despite being present in the workflow. The TryGetValue method returns false even when the value exists as a List<object> type.

issues.title: [Bug] Serialization context incorrectly applied to all workflow calls
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Serialization context is being incorrectly applied to all workflow calls in .NET SDK, but should only be selectively applied based on specific situations to match Java SDK behavior. This requires a backwards-incompatible change decision.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Consider updating tests to use .NET 10
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Update .NET SDK test framework to target .NET 10 instead of .NET 6, and remove the dotNetVersionOverride concept from CI configuration. Discussion needed on whether to maintain .NET 6 compatibility for backward compatibility testing.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Ensure tests exist to confirm custom slot supplier slot info has proper fields
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add tests confirming that custom Nexus slot supplier slot info has proper fields, ensuring integration with the broader Temporal feature set.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Nexus OpenTelemetry support
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to add OpenTelemetry (OTel) support to the .NET SDK, similar to the tracing work implemented in the Java SDK. This would enable distributed tracing and observability for Temporal workflows in .NET applications.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Nexus cancellation type support
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add support for Nexus cancellation type in the .NET SDK, mirroring the implementation from the Python SDK. This feature request is dependent on a Core SDK fix that was being tracked separately.

issues.title: TLS support without mTLS
issues.author: rangp
issues.summary: User deployed Temporal server behind an Istio gateway with TLS termination at the gateway but plain HTTP to the backend. The .NET SDK failed with an unknown certificate issuer error because the server certificate CA was not trusted by default.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Ensure gRPC binary metadata headers are supported
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add support for gRPC binary metadata headers in the .NET SDK. This feature requires base64 encoding of binary values and coordination with sdk-core to handle dictionary values as bytes without breaking existing users.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Reclassify Benign Application errors in OpenTelemetry
issues.author: THardy98
issues.summary: Feature request to reclassify benign application errors in OpenTelemetry spans, following the pattern established in the Python SDK issue #1041.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Plugin support
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add plugin support to the .NET SDK, as part of the broader Temporal plugin architecture initiative referenced in the features repository.

issues.title: [Bug] Duplicate activity registration does not throw
issues.author: mehaKumar
issues.summary: Duplicate activity and workflow registration does not throw an error, causing silent failures where the worker doesn't register on the task queue. The issue occurs when using TemporalWorkerService with start/stop instead of the recommended host building approach.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add first execution run ID to workflow info
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to add the first execution run ID to the workflow info exposed in the .NET SDK. This feature is being tracked in the features repository to ensure parity across SDKs.

issues.title: Can I have separate worker and client applications without duplicating all workflows and activities?
issues.author: brightly-kenbarnett
issues.summary: User asks if there's a way to start workflows from a separate client application without requiring the full workflow type definition and dependency tree. They want to use a string-based workflow name instead of a typed lambda expression, similar to how the CLI works.

issues.title: [Bug] Segfault/crash occurs when using tasks without await
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: A segmentation fault or access violation occurs when using tasks without proper await patterns in workflows. The issue stems from the worker being disposed before asynchronous operations complete, causing the bridge to poll workflow activations on an already-disposed worker.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add Summary to LocalActivityOptions
issues.author: yuandrew
issues.summary: Request to add a Summary field to LocalActivityOptions for better tracking and identification of local activities in the .NET SDK.

issues.title: Inconsistent log property names for the workflow run identifier
issues.author: DSmith-VERX
issues.summary: The workflow logger uses 'RunId' for the workflow run identifier, while the activity logger uses 'WorkflowRunId' for the same information. This naming inconsistency causes confusion when filtering logs, though the maintainer notes this is intentional to match property names in ActivityInfo and WorkflowInfo objects.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Environment Configuration
issues.author: THardy98
issues.summary: Request to implement environment configuration support for the .NET SDK, following the cross-SDK specification for external client configuration.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Provide last result and last failure to workflows
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to provide last result and last failure information to workflows. This has already been implemented in PR #136.

issues.title: [Bug] Improperly accessing current activity context in outbound heartbeat
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Activity heartbeater is incorrectly accessing the current context to get the task token, but heartbeating should be allowed outside of context. The interceptor needs the task token provided through a different mechanism.

issues.title: [Bug] OpenTelemetry TracingInterceptor doesn't create a span in workflow run method
issues.author: san127127
issues.summary: OpenTelemetry TracingInterceptor doesn't create spans for workflow run methods, preventing trace ID correlation for workflow-level logs. While activities receive trace IDs, the workflow execution itself lacks tracing context.

issues.title: [.NET] Worker Versioning high level client
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Implement a high-level client API for worker deployment control plane operations in the .NET SDK, following patterns from the Go SDK implementation.

issues.title: [Bug] Investigate test flake for `CanRunWith_CustomSlotSupplier`
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Test flake detected in `CanRunWith_CustomSlotSupplier` where an assertion expects 20 but occasionally gets 21. The issue appears related to slot supplier behavior during worker shutdown and is suspected to be caused by a race condition in sdk-core.

issues.title: [Bug] Auto-time-skipping may not reset properly
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Auto-time-skipping in WorkflowEnvironment may have a logic error where an assignment or conditional is reversed, potentially causing improper reset behavior.

issues.title: [Bug] Update result serialization failure silently swallowed
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Update result serialization exceptions are silently swallowed due to the use of `task.ContinueWith`, preventing proper error surfacing. This needs to be fixed to surface serialization failures as task failures similar to regular update failures.

issues.title: [.net] SDK support for activity reset
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Feature request to add activity reset support to the .NET SDK, tracking alignment with a cross-SDK features issue.

issues.title: [Bug] Unregistered Local Activity should fail Workflow Task
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Unregistered local activities should cause workflow task failures instead of being silently ignored. This issue tracks a bug where the .NET SDK doesn't properly validate that local activities are registered before execution.

issues.title: [Bug] Workflow info start time using activation/task time instead
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Workflow info start time is using activation/task start time instead of the actual workflow start time from the initialize job. The team decided to document the current behavior and add a new field for workflow start time rather than changing the existing behavior for backwards compatibility.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Use GH ARM runner on binary build GH workflow
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Update the .NET SDK's binary build GitHub workflow to use the native GH ARM runner instead of the BuildJet ARM runner, consistent with the change made for CI in issue #308.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Change get static summary/details on workflow in client to be lazy
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Change workflow summary and details retrieval in the .NET client from eager decoding to lazy loading upon request for better performance.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Warn when the server-provided task start time is fairly different than time SDK begins processing the task
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add a warning when the server-provided task start time differs significantly from when the SDK begins processing the task.

issues.title: [Bug] Issues with ReserveCtxFromBridge
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Memory corruption and segmentation faults occurring in ReserveCtxFromBridge when the server sends error responses (e.g., namespace not found), causing AccessViolationException and ArgumentNullException in .NET code that handles C bridge interop.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Show retry policy on activity info
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to expose retry policy information on the ActivityInfo object, allowing users to inspect what retry policy is configured for an activity.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Apply application failure logging and metrics behaviour according to `ApplicationErrorCategory`
issues.author: THardy98
issues.summary: Apply application failure logging and metrics behavior according to ApplicationErrorCategory in the .NET SDK. This requires implementing corresponding logging behavior as core SDK handles metrics.

issues.title: [Bug] Go SDK Child Workflow returning no values causes await to hang in .NET
issues.author: sgeraud
issues.summary: Go SDK child workflows that return no value (nil/missing result) cause .NET parent workflows to hang indefinitely when awaiting completion. The issue stems from Go SDK omitting the result field entirely when a child workflow has no return value, which .NET SDK doesn't handle properly.

issues.title: Less strict checking of `UseWorkerVersioning`
issues.author: vchirikov
issues.summary: User wants to set an explicit Build ID on workers without enforcing the full UseWorkerVersioning validation checks. The SDK currently prevents setting a Build ID unless UseWorkerVersioning is explicitly enabled.

issues.title: Heartbeating activities should be interrupted when the activities are paused.
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Activities should be interrupted when paused, including their heartbeating mechanisms. This issue tracks the need to ensure heartbeat operations respect the paused state of activities.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support user data in forwarded log callback in C bridge
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add support for passing arbitrary user data through the forwarded log callback in the C bridge. Currently, the logging callback doesn't support user data context similar to other callbacks, limiting functionality for low-level C bridge users.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add `ActivityDefinition.CreateWithoutAttribute` helper
issues.author: DSmith-VERX
issues.summary: User requests a helper method `ActivityDefinition.CreateWithoutAttribute` to allow custom runtime naming of activities without needing to subclass the sealed `ActivityAttribute`. This would enable reusable activity contract patterns using generics and custom naming logic.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Serialization context for codecs and converters
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add serialization context for codecs and converters in the .NET SDK, enabling better control over serialization behavior during workflow execution.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support New Worker Versioning API
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: Add support for the new Worker Versioning API to .NET SDK by implementing annotations on workflows. This feature request references the Go SDK implementation and design specifications for consistent cross-language support.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add ability to temporarily disable tracing event listener in workflows
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add the ability to temporarily disable tracing event listener in workflows. Users need a way to selectively opt-out of tracing checks for small bits of code, such as a static method `WithTracingEventListenerDisabled<T>` in `Temporalio.Workflows.Workflow.Unsafe`.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Workflow logging - NLog async calls
issues.author: jimborogers
issues.summary: NLog async calls in workflows trigger non-determinism errors due to thread transfer tasks. A request for an unsafe API method to allow async logging without breaking workflow determinism.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Allow metric meters to be constructed by users for tests
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Allow users to construct metric meter instances for testing purposes. Currently, MetricMeter is abstract with internal constructors, preventing users from creating test instances in ActivityEnvironment.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add summary to Nexus operation
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Feature request to add a summary field to Nexus operations in the .NET SDK, similar to functionality available in other Temporal SDKs. This would provide better documentation and visibility into operation metadata.

issues.title: [Bug] Replay after UnhandledCommand can cause main workflow body to complete before signals are handled
issues.author: robcao
issues.summary: Workflow main body completes before all signal handlers finish when multiple signals arrive during continue-as-new, causing signal results to be lost. The issue occurs because event loop runs after each individual signal instead of batching signal processing.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Initial Nexus implementation
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Temporal .NET SDK needs Nexus implementation alongside the Nexus .NET SDK. This feature request references the cross-SDK Nexus specification work being tracked in the features repository.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Move Rust C bridge to sdk-core
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Move the Rust C bridge implementation from the .NET SDK to sdk-core to allow other language SDKs to reuse it without duplicating the C interfacing code.

issues.title: [Feature Request] ActivityOptions provider capability for testing
issues.author: gauravthadani
issues.summary: Feature request to add ActivityOptions provider capability for testing in .NET SDK, similar to Java SDK. The request was closed after discussion clarified that cross-SDK approach is to set activity options in workflow at runtime rather than externally.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Provide synchronous Run method in testing
issues.author: mehaKumar
issues.summary: User requests a synchronous Run method for ActivityEnvironment in the testing API to unit test synchronous activity methods that use ActivityExecutionContext.Current.Logger without resorting to workarounds like mocking or async wrappers.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Requesting that WorkflowHandle's members are marked virtual or inherit from interface
issues.author: neiljohari
issues.summary: WorkflowHandle is not mockable in unit tests because it's a record without virtual methods or interface implementation, preventing dynamic interceptors like FakeItEasy from mocking calls to SignalAsync and other methods.

issues.title: [Bug] Returning original unaltered payload from codec causes error
issues.author: travismcchesney
issues.summary: Codec implementations that return the original unaltered payload cause a KeyNotFoundException in the SDK. The issue occurs because the SDK assumes payloads are always mutated and doesn't check if the returned payload is the same object as the input.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Custom metric bucket sizes
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to expose custom histogram metric bucket size overrides in the .NET SDK, as implemented in sdk-core and already available in other SDKs via the features specification.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Expose root workflow execution
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to expose root workflow execution in the .NET SDK, dependent on upstream work in sdk-core and the features repository.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Built-in query responses should use "RawValue"
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to ensure built-in query responses use 'RawValue' in the .NET SDK, as outlined in the cross-repository features issue #604.

issues.title: Expose Workflow cancel cause/reason
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: The .NET SDK should expose the cancel cause/reason field from WorkflowExecutionCancelRequestedEventAttributes when workflows receive cancellations, and allow users to specify this field when issuing cancellations from clients or commands.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Remove experimental warning from `RequestEagerStart`
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Remove the experimental warning from the `RequestEagerStart` API option for eager workflow start in the .NET SDK. This is a documentation cleanup that depends on eager workflow start being officially marked as GA.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Include musl-based build in NuGet package
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to include musl-based build in the NuGet package for the .NET SDK, referencing a cross-repository feature issue for standardization.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add tests/confirm signal handlers run first and as expected
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add comprehensive tests to verify that signal handlers execute before workflow code wakes up and that multiple signals in the same task are processed correctly. The issue addresses concerns about signal processing order and timing in the .NET SDK's scheduler.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Update .NET SDK with latest Cloud Operations API
issues.author: robcao
issues.summary: Request to update the .NET SDK with the latest Cloud Operations API definitions, which are 8 months outdated. Users currently face namespace conflicts when trying to use newer Cloud Operations API versions alongside the .NET SDK, particularly needing the usage API for billing and activity tracking.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support Priority Annotations
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Feature request to add support for attaching priority levels to workflows and activities in the .NET SDK. This aligns with a cross-repository features initiative to enable priority-based task scheduling.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Expose read-only headers to activity info
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to expose read-only headers to activity info, similar to how headers are exposed in workflow info for use in interceptors like the update handler tracing interceptor.

issues.title: [Bug] Issue with Azure and AWS .NET 8 images and TLS of latest SDK
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: TLS connectivity fails in .NET 8 when using the latest SDK with AWS or Azure .NET images, showing 'native TLS certs not found' error. The issue only occurs when all three conditions are met: latest SDK, AWS/Azure image, and .NET 8.

issues.title: [Bug] Workflow codec not working with new timer summary
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The WorkflowCodecHelper assumes a timer summary is non-null, but this assumption is incorrect. The code needs to be fixed and test coverage added.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add explicit memoization support to the`Patched()` API
issues.author: mjameswh
issues.summary: Add explicit memoization support to the Patched() API by introducing a memoized argument while maintaining backward compatibility. The implementation should delegate memoization handling to Core.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Allow customization of dev server UI port
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to allow customization of the development server UI port in the .NET SDK. This is a follow-up to a cross-SDK features discussion.

issues.title: [Bug] Temporalio.Exceptions.RpcException:operation was canceled
issues.author: pauldotknopf
issues.summary: RpcException with 'operation was canceled' error when calling DescribeNamespaceAsync in health check, occurring immediately without timeout. User questions whether sharing TemporalClient across threads is safe.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add workflow search attributes as Activity tags
issues.author: petrkoutnycz
issues.summary: Feature request to append workflow custom search attributes to activity tags in OpenTelemetry tracing to enable filtering traces by those attributes.

issues.title: [Feature Request] OTel metrics over HTTP
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to expose ability for Core OTel metrics to use HTTP protocol instead of the default gRPC. This is a feature request to add a simple boolean flag to enable HTTP-based metrics collection.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Special behavior for Temporal built-in prefixes
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request for special handling of Temporal built-in prefixes in the .NET SDK, as defined in a cross-SDK features issue.

issues.title: [Feature Request] F# Samples/Documentation
issues.author: purkhusid
issues.summary: Feature request for F# samples and documentation in the .NET SDK to lower the barrier of entry for F# users. Users have encountered challenges with serialization of F# unions and need guidance on F# compatibility with Temporal.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Provide client from activity context
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to allow users to access a Temporal client instance from within an activity by adding a Client property to ActivityExecutionContext, enabling activities to interact with the Temporal service.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Access to workflow/activity instance from context
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to expose workflow and activity instances through static properties (`Workflow.Instance` and `ActivityExecutionContext.Instance`) to enable access to the current execution context from within user code.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Provide "workflow local"
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add WorkflowLocal<T> feature to provide workflow-scoped variables similar to AsyncLocal, allowing users to store workflow-specific state that is isolated to each workflow execution.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Improve WaitConditionAsync semantics
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: WaitConditionAsync currently wakes up all satisfied conditions simultaneously, making it impossible to guarantee a condition remains true after the wait. The request is to wake only a single condition at a time and re-evaluate the loop, enabling safe patterns like acquiring locks within wait conditions.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add support for win-arm64
issues.author: PejmanNik
issues.summary: Feature request to add support for Windows ARM64 (win-arm64) architecture in the .NET SDK. Users are increasingly using Windows on ARM devices, and the library should provide native support similar to Linux and macOS distributions.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Align activation job application with TS changes
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Align .NET SDK's activation job application with TypeScript changes to apply all jobs to state before running the event loop, rather than waking up the event loop after each job.

issues.title: [Bug] CI build is broken due to GHA dropping support for node16-based actions
issues.author: mjameswh
issues.summary: GitHub Actions deprecated Node16-based actions in favor of Node20, which is incompatible with GLIBC 2.27 or earlier. This breaks .NET SDK CI workflows that rely on older Linux distros with GLIBC 2.24 for backward compatibility with customer environments.

issues.title: [Bug] Child workflow already started puts workflow type where run ID is
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: WorkflowAlreadyStartedException constructor incorrectly places workflow type in the run ID parameter position and doesn't properly accept workflow type. The exception needs a separate constructor that accepts workflow type with a nullable run ID, and the run ID property should be made nullable.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Clarify support .NET versions/runtimes in README
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add .NET runtime support information directly in the README instead of requiring users to check NuGet package details.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Allow access to optional `MethodInfo` on `ActivityDefinition`
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to expose optional MethodInfo property on ActivityDefinition to allow users to perform reflection operations like checking attributes on the underlying method.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add DisableEagerExecution to WorkerOptions
issues.author: tsurdilo
issues.summary: Add DisableEagerExecution option to WorkerOptions to allow users to disable eager activity dispatch, enabling proper rate limiting via MaxTaskQueueActivitiesPerSecond since eager dispatch bypasses task queue rate limits.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Make scoped IServiceProvider available to ActivityInboundInterceptor
issues.author: tdg5
issues.summary: ActivityInboundInterceptor needs access to the scoped IServiceProvider to handle cross-cutting concerns that depend on injected services. Currently, only Activities can use constructor injection, preventing interceptors from accessing scoped dependencies.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Clarify in workflow constructor exception that DI is not supported
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to improve error messaging when attempting to register workflows with dependency injection, which is not supported. The error message should explicitly clarify that DI is not supported and explain why workflows must be deterministic and self-contained.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Auto-skip time in time-skipping testing environment when waiting on update result
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add automatic time-skipping for update results in the test framework, similar to the existing auto-skip behavior for workflow results. This improves testing experience in time-skipping testing environments.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support user metadata
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add support for user metadata in .NET SDK by accepting optional static summary/details when starting workflows and timers, and optional summary for activities. Implement __temporal_workflow_metadata query handler to match feature parity with other SDKs.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Update Cargo dependencies including Tonic
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Update Cargo dependencies to use a newer version of Tonic (newer than 0.12.1) to enable system CA certificate usage by default for secure connections.

issues.title: [Bug] Unexpected Serialization of Activity Results
issues.author: robcao
issues.summary: Activity returning Task<WorkflowHandle> causes unexpected serialization of the workflow handle (including sensitive client credentials) to workflow history. The issue occurs because WorkflowHandle contains a reference to TemporalClient with API keys and TLS options.

issues.title: Show update handler and ID in logging context
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Request to include update handler information and update ID in logging context for better observability when handling workflow state updates in .NET SDK.

issues.title: [Bug] Generic Activity methods are unsupported
issues.author: ElanHasson
issues.summary: Generic activity methods are not supported and fail at runtime with a reflection error. The issue should be caught eagerly during worker creation rather than failing at execution time.

issues.title: [Bug] Failing to build completion does not use task token when creating failure
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Exception handling in ActivityWorker's failure processing catch block doesn't log the exception or set the task token, potentially swallowing critical failures that occur while handling other failures.

issues.title: NU1903 error when run dotnet build
issues.author: rstm-sf
issues.summary: NuGet package vulnerability warnings are being treated as errors due to TreatWarningsAsErrors setting, causing dotnet build to fail when System.Text.Json and other system packages have known vulnerabilities.

issues.title: UpdateWithStart SDK API
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Request to expose update-with-start operations via the .NET SDK, allowing workflows to be updated or created in a single operation.

issues.title: [Bug] Payload data not properly cleared before replaced
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Payload data is not properly cleared before being replaced in workflow codec operations. When incoming data is null or empty, the merge logic fails to replace existing data, leaving stale payload information.

issues.title: [Bug] Metrics stopped working after the upgrade from 1.2.0 to 1.3.0
issues.author: petrkoutnycz
issues.summary: OpenTelemetry metrics export to New Relic failed after upgrading to SDK version 1.3.0 due to a TLS configuration issue. The error 'Connecting to HTTPS without TLS enabled' was logged at DEBUG level instead of a higher level, making it invisible in production environments.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Include more details from tonic from failed client_rpc_call invocations
issues.author: robcao
issues.summary: RpcException failures from client_rpc_call invocations lack detailed error information compared to connection failures. The exception only contains a generic 'transport error' message without the underlying gRPC status code or detailed error source information that would aid debugging.

issues.title: [Bug] Cloud tests not actually running on cloud
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Cloud tests are not actually running on cloud due to a mismatch between expected and actual environment variable names. The CLI cloud tests use `TEMPORAL_CLIENT_*` env vars but the code expects `TEMPORAL_TEST_CLIENT_*` env vars.

issues.title: [Feature Request] `ReplayWorkflowsAsync` should take `limit` parameter
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Add a `limit` parameter to `ReplayWorkflowsAsync` method to control the number of workflows replayed, improving performance when replaying large workflow histories. This aligns with similar functionality in the Python SDK.

issues.title: [Bug] Copy paste error in Update docstring / API reference documentation
issues.author: dandavison
issues.summary: The WorkflowUpdateOptions RPC documentation has a copy-paste error that incorrectly states 'for starting the workflow' when it should say 'for sending the update'. This misleading documentation needs correction.

issues.title: [Bug] Non-determinism found during fuzzing
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Non-determinism error occurring during fuzzing with KitchenSinkWorkflow where activity machine fails to handle HistoryEvent. The issue was identified through the OMES fuzzer and reproduced via workflow replayer with specific seed.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Clarify in README that CancellationTokenSource.CancelAsync is unsafe
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to clarify in README that CancellationTokenSource.CancelAsync (added in .NET 8) uses the default scheduler and is unsafe for Temporal workflows. Users should use Cancel instead.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Do not warn on unfinished handler on workflow failure
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to suppress warnings for unfinished handlers when a workflow fails, while continuing to warn for cancelled or continued-as-new workflows.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Document default RPC options when left null/unset
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to document the default RPC timeout values in RPC options documentation. The .NET SDK applies internally-set default timeouts per RPC call, but these defaults are not documented, making it unclear what timeout is used when RPC options are left null/unset.

issues.title: Support WorkflowIdConflictPolicy for Signal-With-Start API
issues.author: stephanos
issues.summary: Add support for WorkflowIdConflictPolicy parameter to the Signal-With-Start API in the .NET SDK, following the implementation already added to StartWorkflow in PR #304.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support schedule search attribute update
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add support for schedule search attribute updates in the .NET SDK, following the pattern established in the Go SDK implementation.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Update core and confirm new post-complete command reordering
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Update the SDK's command reordering logic to align with Core's new approach of moving the first workflow completion command last, while properly handling multiple completion commands and maintaining backward compatibility.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Update schedule default values
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Update the default schedule policy timeout value from the current value to 1 year to match the server default, as specified in the Temporal API changes. The team decided to update the client-side default value rather than making it fully optional.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Replace `System.TimeProvider` in workflows
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to replace the current time handling in workflows with .NET's System.TimeProvider API, which provides a standard abstraction for timers and time retrieval. The feature should expose a Workflow.TimeProvider property for testing purposes while maintaining the default behavior without magic.

issues.title: Handle multiple completion commands
issues.author: dandavison
issues.summary: The .NET SDK incorrectly handles multiple completion commands by truncating non-query commands that appear after completion commands. This needs to be fixed to send all commands to core, allowing the core runtime to properly handle interleaved completion and non-completion commands.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Create wrappers for commonly-known-safe async calls
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to create wrapper methods on the Workflow class for commonly-used async task functions like WhenAllAsync and StartNewTask, similar to existing WhenAnyAsync and DelayAsync wrappers, to provide users with confidence in using these standard library calls.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support "query" when listing schedules
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add query support when listing schedules in the .NET SDK, matching the existing functionality available for listing workflows.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Upon initial client connection, use `RpcException` if initial `GetSystemInfo` call fails
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to throw RpcException with gRPC details when the initial GetSystemInfo call fails during client connection, rather than a generic connection failure exception.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add Temporalio.Workflows.Mutex as thin facade over single-count Temporalio.Workflows.Semaphore
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add a Mutex class as a thin facade over Semaphore with a single-count configuration, matching .NET threading mutex method names like WaitOne and ReleaseMutex.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Replace BuildJet ARM runner with GH runner
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to replace BuildJet ARM runner with GitHub's native ARM runner now that it's available.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Update test running to replay
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The .NET SDK needs enhanced test workflow replay capabilities. Currently tests don't replay workflows or run without cache, which could miss issues. The request is to auto-replay workflows that complete in tests to improve test coverage.

issues.title: [Bug] Worker does not retry if connection fails and kills the whole process
issues.author: petrkoutnycz
issues.summary: Worker service crashes and takes down the entire .NET application when connection to Temporal server fails, instead of retrying. This is especially problematic in .NET 6+ where background service exceptions propagate to the host.

issues.title: Support .NET Trimming
issues.author: angusbjones
issues.summary: Request to add trimming annotations to the .NET SDK to support publishing trimmed and AOT-compatible applications. Currently, attempting to publish with `<PublishTrimmed>true</PublishTrimmed>` produces errors due to missing metadata.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Accept search attributes in dev server startup
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to allow users to configure search attributes when starting the dev server, which should translate to --search-attribute command-line arguments based on changes deployed in the CLI.

issues.title: Workflow-friendly concurrency control
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Need a reentrant and deterministic concurrency control mechanism (mutex/semaphore) for use within workflow coroutines, signal handlers, and update handlers that fits naturally with the .NET language.

issues.title: [Bug] TaskQueue not forwarded when using Test Environment, breaks ContinueAsNew (hangs)
issues.author: mnichols
issues.summary: TaskQueue is not being forwarded when using the Test Environment, causing ContinueAsNew operations to hang due to a missing TaskQueue error. The TaskQueue should be auto-assigned by the workflow if not explicitly provided.

issues.title: Testing
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Minimal testing-related issue with no details provided. The issue contains only the word 'testing' with no description of what testing problem, feature, or request is being addressed.

issues.title: Testing
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Minimal issue with just the word 'testing' as content. Appears to be a placeholder or incomplete issue submission.

issues.title: Testing
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: A minimal testing issue with no description provided. The issue appears to be a placeholder or draft.

issues.title: Wrong casting in several classes
issues.author: StanislavPrusac
issues.summary: Multiple classes in the .NET SDK have incorrect type casting in their Clone() methods. ScheduleOptions casts to WorkflowOptions instead of ScheduleOptions, and similar issues exist in ScheduleTriggerOptions, WorkflowHistoryFetchOptions, ScheduleListOptions, and WorkflowCancelOptions.

issues.title: Expose UpdateID in an update handler
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Request to expose UpdateID in update handlers to allow users to use it as a unique idempotent primary key for their handler logic.

issues.title: [Bug] Workflow.WaitConditionAsync may be blocked in Temporal 1.1.1 and will never be passed even when condition is true
issues.author: eukladchikov-bigw
issues.summary: Workflow.WaitConditionAsync hangs indefinitely in Temporal 1.1.1 even when the condition becomes true, affecting unit tests. The issue was introduced in PR #242 and is resolved in version 1.1.2.

issues.title: Provide methods to wait for all handlers to finish
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Users need a way to await or ignore all remaining handlers when a workflow continues as new or exits. The feature provides an all-handlers-finished property to give users control over this behavior.

issues.title: Warn or error when update handlers dangle across CAN or workflow exit
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Need to warn or error when update handlers don't complete before workflow exit (cancellation, failure, or success). The .NET SDK should implement a handler completion policy allowing users to wait for handlers to finish or explicitly abandon them.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support worker client update when using generic host
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add support for updating the worker client when using generic host in .NET SDK. Users need a ClientUpdater pattern that allows them to push client updates to all workers via DI or manual instantiation.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Clarify what the ICustomMetricMeter is used for in DiagnosticSource extension README
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The README for the DiagnosticSource extension needs clarification about what ICustomMetricMeter is used for and its role in runtime options.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Call Core worker.validate
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add a call to the Core worker.validate function on worker start/run to validate worker configuration and surface errors to the user. This function was added to sdk-core to provide validation capabilities.

issues.title: Wrap GRPC::CANCELED and DEADLINE_EXCEEDED in an SDK Timeout exception for Update
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: Wrap gRPC CANCELED and DEADLINE_EXCEEDED errors in an SDK-specific timeout exception for the Update API, so users only need to catch one predictable exception type instead of handling raw gRPC errors.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Do not set workflow completion until after all coroutines have settled in the task
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to delay workflow completion until all coroutines have settled in the task, preventing premature completion before all async operations finish.

issues.title: [Bug] Client hangs when waiting for calls on main thread
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Client hangs when Task.WaitAll() is used on the main thread to wait for schedule creation tasks. The issue occurs because TaskCompletionSource can deadlock on the same thread without proper async continuation scheduling.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support for win-x86
issues.author: kevbry
issues.summary: Request for .NET SDK support for Windows 32-bit (win-x86) architecture to enable direct integration with legacy 32-bit SDKs in activities without requiring wrapper APIs.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Expose raw proto objects on WorkflowExecution and WorkflowExecutionDescription
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to expose internal RawInfo and RawDescription properties on WorkflowExecution and WorkflowExecutionDescription to provide access to raw proto objects and pending activities information.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Cloud Operations API Client
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add a separate Cloud Operations API client for the .NET SDK using cloud protos, marked as experimental. This feature is dependent on sdk-core issue #737.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Enforce no-commands-allowed restrictions in read-only contexts
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to enforce restrictions preventing wait condition callbacks, update validators, and queries from adding commands in read-only contexts within .NET SDK.

issues.title: [Bug] WaitConditionAsync is run outside of Workflow context
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: WaitConditionAsync callback is executed outside the workflow event loop, causing the task scheduler to not be the workflow instance, which makes calls to the Workflow object within the callback fail.

issues.title: [Bug] System.InvalidOperationException: This service descriptor is keyed. Your service provider may not support keyed services
issues.author: ElanHasson
issues.summary: System.InvalidOperationException thrown when calling AddHostedTemporalWorker after registering a keyed service descriptor to the DI container. This issue was introduced in v1.1.0 and stems from code that doesn't properly handle keyed services in the service provider.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Client replacement in worker
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to enable replacing the worker client with a new client that may be connected with different options, such as a new TLS certificate. This allows dynamic client updates without recreating the worker.

issues.title: [Bug] Unexpected reuse of payload instances in payload codec for specific workflow failure scenarios.
issues.author: robcao
issues.summary: Payload codec receives reused payload instances in specific workflow failure scenarios involving ApplicationFailureException with Details objects, causing the same codec instance to be passed multiple times instead of unique instances for each payload.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Make StartUpdateAsync users aware that it's synchronous w/ worker.
issues.author: drewhoskins-temporal
issues.summary: The StartUpdateAsync method should make users aware that it's synchronous with the worker and the wait stage parameter shouldn't be optional. Documentation needs to clarify availability and behavior.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Make Temporalio.Testing to a seperate nuget out of Temporalio
issues.author: rsr-maersk
issues.summary: Request to decouple Temporalio.Testing from the main Temporalio NuGet package into a separate package to avoid distributing test code to production environments.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Make sure all client responses are user-instantiable/mockable
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to make all client response classes user-instantiable and mockable by adding parameterless constructors and property setters. Currently some responses like workflow list results only have internal constructors, making testing difficult.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Make protected DefaultPayloadConverter constructors public
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to make DefaultPayloadConverter protected constructors public to allow users to instantiate converter classes directly, now that the SDK no longer requires converter classes to be inherited.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Allow manual pagination of workflows
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to expose manual pagination controls for workflow list operations, allowing users to specify page size and retrieve next page tokens. This enables stateless pagination for UIs that cannot maintain async iterators in memory.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Document host builder caveats
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Documentation needed for Temporalio.Extensions.Hosting about a caveat where host.Run() (synchronous) doesn't poll for workers while host.RunAsync() (asynchronous) does, and about a known issue from dotnet/runtime that confuses users.

issues.title: Expose defaultConnection() method to switch between localhost and cloud based on env
issues.author: josh-berry
issues.summary: Request to expose a defaultConnection() method in the .NET SDK that switches between localhost and cloud environments based on configuration, enabling samples to run flexibly in both environments.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add visibility link in list workflow method XML doc
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add a documentation link to visibility concepts in the .NET SDK's list workflow method XML documentation. The request sparked discussion about URL stability and whether to link to the general visibility documentation or a more specific list filter section.

issues.title: Support for WorkflowIdConflictPolicy
issues.author: josh-berry
issues.summary: Request to support WorkflowIdConflictPolicy in the .NET SDK. This is a cross-SDK feature that needs to be implemented for parity with other Temporal SDKs.

issues.title: [Feature Request] HTTP CONNECT proxy support
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add HTTP CONNECT proxy support to the .NET SDK, matching the implementation in sdk-core and following the pattern established by the Python SDK.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Document Asynchronous Activity Completion in README
issues.author: send2vinnie
issues.summary: Feature request to document asynchronous activity completion in the .NET SDK README, allowing activities to return early while completion is handled via the Temporal Client using heartbeating and manual completion.

issues.title: [Bug] Cannot add multiple versions of a workflow using DI
issues.author: marcusbooyah
issues.summary: DI container cannot register multiple workflow versions with the same workflow name but different build IDs. The versioning support added later conflicted with the single-worker-per-task-queue constraint that predates it.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add search to API reference
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: User requests adding search functionality to the .NET SDK API reference documentation. Currently, the filter only works for some elements and doesn't include methods, making it difficult to find specific APIs like `Workflow.DelayAsync`.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Use macOS M1/ARM runners for all SDK CI
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: Feature request to enable macOS M1/ARM runners for all SDK CI/CD pipelines, referencing a similar request in the features repository.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support metric option for using seconds (and other recent core metric changes)
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to expose the `use_seconds_for_duration` metric option from sdk-core PR #706 on Prometheus metrics in the .NET SDK, with potential additional updates needed due to other changes in that PR.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support IAsyncDisposable activity classws with async scopes for DI in .NET 6+
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to support IAsyncDisposable activity classes with async scopes for dependency injection in .NET 6+. Currently the SDK only creates synchronous scopes which prevents proper async disposal patterns.

issues.title: [Feature Request] SDK should not return an update handle if the update has not reached the desired state
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: SDK should not return an update handle if the update has not reached the desired state, as referenced in the cross-repository features issue #432.

issues.title: [Feature Request] SDK clients should set a UpdateID on any update request even if the user did not specify one
issues.author: Quinn-With-Two-Ns
issues.summary: SDK clients should automatically generate and set an UpdateID on update requests even when the user doesn't explicitly specify one. The update options constructor should also allow setting the update ID.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Clarification of the release cycle
issues.author: dpr-dev
issues.summary: User requests clarification and documentation of the .NET SDK release cycle to help them anticipate when features and bug fixes will be available. The maintainers clarified that they don't have a fixed release cycle and release as issues warrant.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Expose max poller options for workers
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to expose max poller options for .NET workers, matching Python and TypeScript SDKs. Also requests exposure of sticky to non-sticky ratio configuration.

issues.title: coverlet.collector.3.1.2.nupkg: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.5)
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Coverlet.collector dependency has a vulnerability (CVE-2024-21907) in Newtonsoft.Json before 13.0.1 that can cause denial of service via StackOverflow when deserializing crafted data. The vulnerability is rated High (CVSS 7.5) and requires upgrading the transitive dependency.

issues.title: [Feature Request] API key client option
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add API key client option support to the .NET SDK, aligning with cross-SDK feature implementation discussed in temporalio/features#426.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Clarify in README how SignalWithStart appears is .NET
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: SignalWithStart functionality is not clearly documented in the .NET SDK README or API docs. The request asks to clarify that SignalWithStart is implemented as the start signal on options.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Clarify documentation on the effect of specifying the `NonRetryableErrorTypes` as an empty list
issues.author: eugbyte
issues.summary: User expected that specifying NonRetryableErrorTypes as an empty list would follow default no-retry behavior, but instead the workflow always retries. Request to clarify documentation that an empty NonRetryableErrorTypes list results in always retrying.

issues.title: [Bug] AddAllActivities not working
issues.author: eugbyte
issues.summary: AddAllActivities method fails to recognize mock activities when the [Activity] attribute is only placed on the implementation class. The attribute must also be present on interface methods for the activities to be discovered.

issues.title: Expose next retry delay on Application Failure in all SDKs
issues.author: bergundy
issues.summary: Add support for exposing the next retry delay field from ApplicationFailureInfo across all SDKs. This field was recently added to the API to allow activities to specify custom retry delays on failure.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support workflow metadata query
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add support for workflow metadata queries in the .NET SDK, enabling users to retrieve and inspect workflow metadata during execution.

issues.title: [Bug] [Blazor Webassembly] System.Diagnostics.Process is not supported on this platform
issues.author: djnice
issues.summary: System.Diagnostics.Process.GetCurrentProcess() is not supported in Blazor WebAssembly, causing exceptions when starting workflows. User suggests using System.Environment.ProcessId instead.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Eager Workflow Start
issues.author: antlai-temporal
issues.summary: Add support for Eager Workflow Start (EWS) in the .NET SDK to reduce workflow startup latency. EWS allows clients to directly schedule the first workflow task to a local worker, already implemented in Java, Python, Core, and Go SDKs.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Workflow is static object, not unit testable
issues.author: rsr-maersk
issues.summary: Request to make Workflow instances testable like minimal APIs instead of static classes. User argues the static design prevents true TDD/unit testing and goes against software principles.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Dependency Injection into a workflow
issues.author: rsr-maersk
issues.summary: User requested dependency injection support for workflows, but the maintainer explained that workflows must be deterministic and self-contained, so DI is not supported by design.

issues.title: [Bug] Workflow Update hangs on time skipping environment
issues.author: alrz
issues.summary: Workflow updates hang indefinitely when called in time-skipping test environments. The update method never completes even though it should immediately return, causing the workflow to become unresponsive.

issues.title: [Bug] Child Workflow Cancellation before scheduled surfaces as incorrect error
issues.author: Sushisource
issues.summary: Child workflows cancelled before being scheduled return ChildWorkflowFailureException instead of CanceledFailureException, inconsistent with other cancellation scenarios.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Handle possibility of update-before-start
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Handle updates that arrive before workflow start by implementing a buffer-for-life-of-task approach for update handlers. This allows dynamically registered handlers to receive updates even when the update activation event precedes the start event.

issues.title: [Bug] Not ignoring unknown fields when parsing history for replay
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: .NET SDK does not ignore unknown fields when parsing history JSON for replay, unlike Python and Go SDKs. The issue notes that a JsonParser ignore-unknown-fields setting exists but is not being used.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Schedule creation should create tracing span by default
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add automatic tracing span creation when scheduling workflows with the tracing interceptor enabled, with opt-out capability in tracing options.

issues.title: [Bug] Forcing .net 7 when .net 6 is in LTS
issues.author: rsr-maersk
issues.summary: User questions why the .NET SDK doesn't build for .NET 6 LTS and suggests that keeping each framework version aligned (6 on 6, 7 on 7, 8 on 8) would prevent compatibility issues with transitive dependencies like System.Diagnostics.DiagnosticSource.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add error message to native-library README section for easier discoverability
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add the System.DllNotFoundException error message to the native-library README section to help users discover the solution for DLL loading failures.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Ability for certain task failure types to fail workflow
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add ability to configure which exception types should fail the workflow rather than just the activity. Implement WorkflowFailureExceptionTypes on TemporalWorkerOptions and FailureExceptionTypes on WorkflowAttribute/Definition, while blocking InvalidWorkflowOperationException pending core SDK changes.

issues.title: [Bug] Failed decoding parameters
issues.author: dev-danx
issues.summary: User encountered a JSON deserialization error when passing a JSON string as an activity parameter. The issue was resolved when user corrected their parameter type to match the expected format.

issues.title: [Bug] README workflow testing samples are not running the worker
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: README workflow testing samples are missing worker execution, causing tests to timeout. The documentation shows incomplete example code that doesn't actually run the worker before executing the workflow.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Allow continue as new from update handler
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to allow continue-as-new workflow transitions from update handlers in the .NET SDK. This capability was evaluated but ultimately decided against by the team.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add support for Temporal Schedule
issues.author: dodyg
issues.summary: User requested support for Temporal Schedule feature in the .NET SDK. The feature was already fully implemented but not mentioned in the blog post, so this was essentially a documentation/awareness issue that has been resolved.

issues.title: [Bug] TemporalClient timing out
issues.author: AdnanSoftic
issues.summary: TemporalClient loses connection to Temporal Cloud after 1-2 days, timing out on workflow start operations. The connection doesn't recover automatically despite keep-alive being enabled, requiring application restart.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Default TemporalWorkerOptions.DebugMode to Debugger.IsAttached
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to automatically default TemporalWorkerOptions.DebugMode to the value of Debugger.IsAttached, while still allowing explicit overrides to true or false.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Clarify that the client is threadsafe
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request to clarify in ITemporalClient documentation that the client is thread-safe and should be reused across threads to effectively leverage connection pooling.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Workflow update handle should use resulting run ID on start
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Workflow update handles should automatically use the run ID returned from the start operation, ensuring consistency. The issue also calls for better documentation about the consequences of not using a workflow handle with a specific run ID.

issues.title: [Bug] WorkflowHandle.StartUpdateAsync does not unwrap exception properly
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: StartUpdateAsync throws AggregateException instead of unwrapping the actual exception when called on a non-existent workflow handle, due to improper exception handling in the ContinueWith implementation.

issues.title: Remove ClientOutboundInterceptor.PollWorkflowUpdateAsync
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Remove the PollWorkflowUpdateAsync method from ClientOutboundInterceptor as it doesn't need to be interceptable, similar to how getting a workflow result is not interceptable.

issues.title: Remove timeout from WorkflowUpdateHandle.GetResultAsync
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Remove the timeout parameter from WorkflowUpdateHandle.GetResultAsync as it's redundant when users can achieve the same behavior using cancellation tokens, and the timeout is not present on WorkflowHandle.GetResultAsync for consistency.

issues.title: [Feature Request] StartDelay in Workflow Options
issues.author: tlalfano
issues.summary: Request to expose the StartDelay option in Workflow Options, allowing users to delay the start of workflow execution.

issues.title: [Bug] DeleteWorkflowExecution service call not exposed properly
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The DeleteWorkflowExecution gRPC service call is not properly exposed in the .NET SDK. Additionally, there's a need for comprehensive unit tests to ensure all workflow and operator service calls are tested going forward.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Allow dynamic ssl/tls on the client.
issues.author: robcao
issues.summary: Feature request to support dynamic TLS/SSL certificate refresh on the Temporal .NET client without restarting workers. Users need the ability to update TLS options at runtime to handle short-lived certificates required by compliance policies.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Add support for Log forwarding to lang-side
issues.author: mjameswh
issues.summary: Add support for log forwarding from core to language side in .NET SDK, similar to existing TypeScript implementation. Currently, a log forwarding export layer is registered in Bridge but never polled, making it effectively a no-op.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Clarify support for alternative architectures
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Document and clarify that the .NET NuGet package doesn't support Windows ARM, 32-bit, or Linux MUSL architectures. Consider building separate runtime packages for these alternative architectures if GitHub runners become available.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Confirm absense of metric config still results in no-op metric meter
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The .NET SDK needs to ensure that when metrics config is not present, a no-op metric meter is used instead of failing to create one, matching the behavior implemented in the Python SDK.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Investigate signal with start helper on options that is type safe
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Request for a type-safe helper method on options for signal with start functionality. Currently uses an untyped approach; the feature request seeks a lambda expression-based alternative that provides compile-time type safety.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Need LastFailure and LastResult on WorkflowInfo
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Add LastFailure and LastResult properties to WorkflowInfo in the .NET SDK to match functionality available in other Temporal SDKs. These properties are useful for workflow retries and cron/schedule workflows.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Typed Search Attributes
issues.author: lorensr
issues.summary: Feature request for typed search attributes in the .NET SDK. This was a proposal to implement typed search attributes similar to other Temporal SDKs, and has already been implemented in the .NET SDK.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support single-platform local NuGet package build
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to support building NuGet packages locally for a single platform, rather than requiring the full multi-platform build that currently only works in GitHub workflows.

issues.title: tonic-0.9.2.crate: 2 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 7.5) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Security vulnerabilities detected in tonic-0.9.2 dependency chain, specifically CPU denial of service vulnerabilities in rustls-webpki-0.101.3 transitive dependency. The highest severity vulnerability (CVE-7.5) could allow network-based DoS attacks.

issues.title: cbindgen-0.24.5.crate: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 5.3)
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Transitive dependency vulnerability in atty-0.2.14 (CVSS 5.3) affecting cbindgen-0.24.5 through clap. The issue involves potential pointer misalignment on Windows, though practically mitigated by the system allocator.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Advanced metrics support
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to implement advanced metrics support in the .NET SDK following sdk-core updates, including Prometheus options, OpenTelemetry options, and access to metrics from runtime, activity, and workflow contexts. Most items are completed, with .NET-provided metric implementation remaining as a non-trivial task.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support client keep alive
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to expose client keep-alive functionality once the design is finalized in sdk-core. This is a dependency on upstream architecture decisions.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Expose WorkflowInfo.LastFailure
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to expose WorkflowInfo.LastFailure property in the .NET SDK, which should contain information about the last failure of a workflow execution.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Expose history-related properties to workflow
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to expose history-related properties (`HistoryLength`, `HistorySize`, and `ShouldContinueAsNew`) to the Workflow class in the .NET SDK for better history management within workflows.

issues.title: cbindgen-0.24.3.crate: 1 vulnerabilities (highest severity is: 9.8) - autoclosed
issues.author: app/mend-for-github-com
issues.summary: Critical security vulnerability (CVSS 9.8) in transitive dependency atty-0.2.14 used by cbindgen-0.24.3, with potential unaligned read vulnerability. Issue was automatically closed after the vulnerable library was removed from inventory.

issues.title: [Bug] Activity definition cache reuses instance
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Activity definition caching incorrectly reuses the invoker instance across different activity instances registered on different objects, causing the wrong invoker to be used. Only non-invocable details should be cached, not the instance-bound invoker.

issues.title: [Bug] DI worker service not using obtained logger factory
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The DI worker service contains a logic error where it checks if an existing client's logger factory is null, which is impossible. The check should either be fixed to allow null values or removed entirely.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Update README client DI to use extension project
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Update the README to demonstrate client dependency injection using the extension project instead of the current approach. This change is dependent on issue #98 being released first.

issues.title: Use single-L for all cancelled (sic) type names like .NET does
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Standardize exception naming to use single-L for 'canceled' type names (e.g., CanceledFailureException) to align with .NET conventions, while keeping double-L for 'cancellation' in other contexts like CancellationToken.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Support unsafe tracing event disabling in workflows
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: Feature request to add a way to disable tracing events within workflows to support running non-workflow async calls in workflow interceptors. The request was closed because the proposed solution doesn't address the underlying problem of running code outside the workflow scheduler.

issues.title: [Feature Request] Clarify in README the role of the native shared library
issues.author: cretz
issues.summary: The README needs to clarify that the .NET SDK requires a native shared library (temporal_sdk_bridge) for different platforms and architectures. Users building for different platforms than their build machine need explicit runtime identifiers, and the documentation should explain why a Rust-backed native library is used.
